title:
Inching toward the QCD Axions with Axion Magnetic Resonance in
  Helioscopes
authors: Hyeonseok Seong, Chen Sun and Seokhoon Yun
abstract:
Utilizing a helical magnet profile to enhance axion-photon conversion showed
great promise in laboratory searches for high axion masses. We extend the
mechanism, known as the axion-magnetic resonance (AMR), from laser experiments
to axion helioscopes and demonstrate its potential in covering QCD axion
parameter space. Specifically, we apply AMR to the CAST experiment legacy, make
projections for the upcoming IAXO experiment, and assess its implications for
both axion-like particles and QCD axions. We observe considerable improvement
in the experiment's sensitivity reach in all cases.
